content.text:
# Music Awards of Nagaland

The [https://www.youtube.com/@NativeTraxNagaland Music Awards of Nagaland]  is a music awards show presented by the Native Trax Society. The annual ceremony was first held in 2009.
Ceremonies

Categories
*Best EDM Song
*Best Gospel Song
*Best Gospel Song (Local Dialect)
*Best Lyricist/Songwriter
*Best Music Video
*Best Pop Song (Solo)
*Best Pop Song (Duo/Group)
*Best Pop Song (Local Dialects)
*Best Producer
*Best Rap/Hip Hop Song
*Best Rap/Hip Hop Song (Hindi/Local Dialects)
*Best Rock Song (Alt/Indie)
*Best Rock Song (Metal/Heavy)
*Best Sound Engineer
*Best Upcoming Artiste/Band
*Best Video Director
*Lifetime Achievement Awards
*Song of the Year
